parameters.text:
"Block Selected: " & blockSelected & newline & 
   "Delete Mode: " & (deleteMode = 1 ? "Enabled" : "Disabled") & newline & 
   "Menu Open: " & (menuOpen = 1 ? "Yes" : "No") & newline & 
   "Save Completed: " & (onSaveCompletedN = 1 ? "File" : (onSaveCompletedN = 2 ? "Local" : "No")) & newline & "Player x:" & floor(player.x / 32) &  newline & "Player y:" & floor(player.Y / 32) & newline & "FPS:" & fps
